data.actual_result: Text won't be shown with boldness and just `**` before and after the text. This issue probably also applies for other Markdown formatting.
data.expected_result: Text should be shown bold and not with \*\*
data.short_description: Markdown formatting with linebreak (\n\n) in embed not shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Use a bot with Discord rich embed - add boldness text with \*\* inside the bot's embed message - send the message in a chat and view it with an iOS device
